CustomField.description: ** Defaults Group Name ** Combined with the Search Results Sort Order, this field defines the field to sort group search results in ascending or descending order. Limited to Group Fields Only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Defaults Group Name ** Combined with the Search Results Sort Order, this field defines the field to sort group search results in ascending or descending order. Limited to Group Fields Only.
CustomField.label: Group Search Default Sort Field
